thread.title: MUST-SEE VIDEO: LIRR Rider’s Hilarious ‘All By Myself’ Performance Aboard LIRR During Winter Storm
thread.title_full: MUST-SEE VIDEO: LIRR Rider’s Hilarious ‘All By Myself’ Performance Aboard LIRR During Winter Storm

author: CBS New York
title: MUST-SEE VIDEO: LIRR Rider’s Hilarious ‘All By Myself’ Performance Aboard LIRR During Winter Storm
text:
MUST-SEE VIDEO: LIRR Rider’s Hilarious ‘All By Myself’ Performance Aboard LIRR During Winter Storm March 14, 2017 3:57 PM Filed Under: Blizzard 2017 
NEW YORK (CBSNewYork) – Most folks hunkered down during Tuesday’s blizzard . But some folks had to come in to work. 
For Scott Green, that meant taking the LIRR. 
He boarded the 7:19 a.m. train from Ronkonkoma and found himself, well, all by himself. 
“I was pretty bored,” said Green. “I was very bored.” 
So he did what any New Yorker would do: Pull out his cell phone and make a video. 
The results were pretty hilarious. 
Check it out above.
